first_para: Steven Mark Ward Reed OBE (born 12 November 1963) is a British Labour and Co-operative Party politician who has been the Member of Parliament (MP) for Croydon North since 2012. He was previously the Leader of Lambeth Council from 2006 to 2012.

full.extract:
Steven Mark Ward Reed OBE (born 12 November 1963) is a British Labour and Co-operative Party politician who has been the Member of Parliament (MP) for Croydon North since 2012. He was previously the Leader of Lambeth Council from 2006 to 2012.
^ http://www.lambeth.gov.uk/moderngov/mgUserInfo.aspx?UID=134
^ http://labourlist.org/2012/11/steve-reed-selected-as-labours-candidate-in-croydon-north/
full.title: Steve Reed (politician)
